amendment.description: To fund activities relating to the suppression and control of Mormon crickets and grasshoppers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3163 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3163 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 3411. To fund activities relating to the suppression and control of Mormon crickets and grasshoppers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3163 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3163 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 3411.
